t: Amazon.com: Amazon Dash Cart: Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: For items like produce, the Dash Cart touchscreen shows the nearest items for you to select from, or you can search for items by name using the search feature. Dash Cart also has a built in scale that will weigh your item when you place it in the cart, and show you the price.

t: Amazon Rolls Out Smart 'Dash Carts' in Whole Foods Stores
s: Similarly, in September 2020, the brand began introducing "Amazon Dash Carts" at its own Amazon Fresh stores: smart shopping carts with an onboard computer screen that tracks what customers buy when they place items in the cart.

t: Amazon’s New Smart Shopping Cart Is Pushing Cashierless Checkout In Physical Stores
s: July 18, 2020 - The new smart shopping cart, called Amazon Dash Cart, automatically detects items with sensors, cameras and computer vision algorithms. It allows customers to skip the checkout line in a physical store by charging the credit cards attached to their Amazon accounts.
